title: Land near Kaduwela Gampaha main road for sale
details:
Flat land at Peragashandiya junction in Biyagama.
150m from Kaduwela Gampaha road.
180m to the nearest bus stop.
Electricity and water line available.
30 purchase available. 30 or 15 perches can be purchased..
1km to Biyagama zone gate.
Good for a house or a hostel business.
Near to Kaduwela and Siyambalape junction.
Rs. 325,000 per perch (negotiable)
